properties.entry: SELECT A.MONSTER_NAME, M.MOON_NAME FROM MONSTER A LEFT JOIN SIZE B ON B.SIZE_ID = A.SIZE_ID LEFT JOIN RISK C ON C.RISK_RANK = A.RISK_RANK LEFT JOIN SPAWN D ON D.SPAWN_ID = A.SPAWN_ID LEFT JOIN INTERIOR E ON E.INTERIOR_ID = A.INTERIOR_ID JOIN PERMONSTER Z ON Z.MONSTER_CODE = A.MONSTER_CODE JOIN MOON M ON M.MOON_CODE = Z.MOON_CODE ORDER BY M.MOON_NAME
